channel.title: For goodness sake
channel.description:
Just buy another damn host, I have just lost my diamond set TWICE because of this servers crappy connection.
I don't know what you're hosting Moparisthebest, or what plugins you've got going but I was reduced (again! Third report!) to 0 FPS and had an unreasonable amount of block lagg. It is not my connection as I've been saying forever I can play other servers fine. I was also killed by a zombie who apparently hits 10 hearts and who I can't do damage on.
Just do something with those large stock piles of USD in your bank account and buy a host which actually has internet connection. I now have lost everything because your host decided it wasn't going to register any of my hits, and allow zombies to hit 10s.
It also loads literally 3 chunks and then takes forever to load the rest, whereas if I play another server it loads instantly and I have no issues (I can choose a server at random and it works great!).
Heed my words, this thread shall not drop to page 2 unless you have a new host. I've asked politely about six times now and you won't even respond.

item.title: For goodness sake
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:22, topic:425788”]I believe everything is fixed! No more errors when I go to a certain chunk, and no lag.

Also, as a side-effect, all the animals everywhere were restored, so don’t go killing them all now! :P[/quote]

i think i got all the wolves in w2 lol i dont see any and i went like everywhere

Read full topic

Also, as a side-effect, all the animals everywhere were restored, so don’t go killing them all now!

item.title: For goodness sake
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I believe I have narrowed the problem down to some corrupt chunks or region files, I found a utility to rebuild them and ran it. I need everyone to log on and make sure buildings/chunks weren’t completely destroyed, which is possible. If they were, I can revert the change and try something else.

Read full topic

item.title: For goodness sake
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Pretty sure there is also a login problem with the authentication system, I was able to walk about before logging in, and was reset to spawn when I was in W2…

But yeah, badger is right.

Read full topic

item.title: For goodness sake
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:16, topic:425788”]The server is a very good server, and it has a very good connection. If there is lag or items disappearing or the like, the problem would be in minecraft, craftbukkit, or one of the plugins.

As far as my experience, as long as you log out before the server shuts down, everything saves properly.[/quote]

how could it be minecraft when the server has been working perfectly fine up until the last week…?

and we arent losing our items due to server restarts… people are being spawned in a bottomless void upon login and instantly die and are unable to retrieve their stuff

not to mention chunks loading is nothing except for a slow crawl

im pretty sure the problem is on your host’s side

Read full topic

item.title: For goodness sake
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The server is a very good server, and it has a very good connection. If there is lag or items disappearing or the like, the problem would be in minecraft, craftbukkit, or one of the plugins.

As far as my experience, as long as you log out before the server shuts down, everything saves properly.

Read full topic

item.title: For goodness sake
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Alright guys, let’s all keep chilled!

I’ve just contacted MITB to try and get this all resolved, this amount of lagg and traffic damage it’s causing can’t go on.

Read full topic

I have now been reduced to carrying a chest with me and every hour rushing to shove all my stuff in it cause every server save I come back falling in the void…I think I’m up to six sets and inventory lost

Just buy another damn host, I have just lost my diamond set TWICE because of this servers crappy connection.

I don’t know what you’re hosting Moparisthebest, or what plugins you’ve got going but I was reduced (again! Third report!) to 0 FPS and had an unreasonable amount of block lagg.
